findings.rationale: An indefinite term may pose risks related to the ongoing obligations and liabilities without a clear end, potentially leading to prolonged exposure to confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.rationale: The absence of explicit limitations on how the Receiving Party can use Confidential Information could lead to misuse or unintended disclosures.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party...

findings.rationale: The requirement to return all Confidential Information may create a risk if the Receiving Party does not have adequate processes for compliance.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
